title: Curiosity Concert #4: Caroline Worra with Brian Garman
desc: Explore?the characters and emotions behind great operatic arias and songs sung in Italian, French, German, and English performed by soprano Caroline Worra and pianist Brian Garman. Ms. Worra has sung more than 75 different operatic roles, including 20 world and American premieres. She is a local star, teaching at Greenwich's The Stanwich School.  Presented in association with the Ashforth Children's Concert Series.
